name: Roll & Jump
description:
Roll & Jump

Roll and Jump your way through 7 levels.

  • Move left and right with arrows or A and D keys
  • Jump with up arrow or W key.
  • Reset level with R key.

Can you beat the game in less than 35 seconds ?

Music by L'apôtre :https://instagram.com/theo_n.v?igshid=YmMyMTA2M2Y=

This game has been made in 48h for the GMTK 2022 game jam.
